'''Busy Kitchen''' is an indoor furnishing set.

It is obtained from the [[Adeptal Mirror]] Round 3.

The Busy Kitchen set requires [[Wide Stone Stove]] which is available from the [[Battle Pass/Realm of Diversion|Realm of Diversion]] Battle Pass: Gnostic Chorus.
